DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.NAME: Block Strike
DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.NAME: Stochastic Process
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! card from your discard pile randomly.
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! cards from your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: Your GPU ran out of VRAM. NL Ethereal.
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Restart deepspikingmod:forward_propagation. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card has not been upgraded and cannot be played.

DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.NAME: Attention Head
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 1 card. NL The value of card's effect, expecting Block and damage, will be multiplied by deepspicingmod:AP .
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 2 cards. NL The value of cards' effect, expecting Block and damage, will be multiplied by deepspicingmod:AP .

DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.NAME: Forward Propagation
DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.DESCRIPTION: Activate all *Attention *Head and *Convolution *Kernel 's effects in discard pile.

DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.NAME: Positional Encoding
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 2 cards in the discard pile.
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 4 cards in the discard pile.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.NAME: Stochastic Gradient Descent
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, remove a stack of deepspiringmod:Loss and gain a stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting randomly.
